about me

Ray "Raydee99" Demers puts the fun in music and brings life to any team that
he is on. He writes everything from, high-energy chiptune, spaghetti
western, sea shanties, and cutesy pop songs about world-destroying
kaijus! He has composed for over a dozen games and is always looking for new opportunities.

CONTACT

Feel free to follow me on social media, or get in touch with a message. I prefer XXX
